biotools.summary:
gene expression recovery for single-cell RNA sequencing using two-side sparse self-representation.

README file for R package supporting the paper "scTSSR: gene expression recovery for single-cell RNA sequencing using two-side sparse self-representation".

The scTSSR package has the following R-package dependencies: SAVER, keras, tensorflow. The dependent packages will be automatically installed along with scTSSR. You can use the following commands to install scTSSR from GitHub.
